title: Puppet Theater, 19th century
description: a) Grey and red frame, base with wall paper in floral and lambrequin pattern.  Gilt ornament with cartouche, "Guinol."   Red cotton curtain with stamped and stencilled design.  Cardboard drapes and wings.  b)  Landscape backdrop, painted wall paper on cardboard with striped cloth as on folding sides.

tombstone.epitaph: Puppet Theater, 19th century. wood, paper, cloth. 1936-27-1-a/c.
